name: Aqua Marbles - Ocean
description:
Deep in the abyss of the ocean lies an underwater kingdom full of color and joy. Dive into a submarine atmosphere complete with colorful graphics and exciting music, but keep an eye out! In the deepest darkest corners lie sunken ships and castles full of danger. Test your courage, complete tough but exciting levels and come back to the sunlight! Check out match-3 from a fresh perspective: increased difficulty and a new game element – petals.

Features:

* 135 challenging underwater levels
* Use a variety of strategies to win
* Colorful ocean worlds to explore
* Relaxing and atmospheric music
* Play with no time limits
